title: Bugsplat
body: So for I think the first time ever I bugsplat randomly at the beginning to the match. I was just to lane at a minute in spamming lucians laugh, and bugsplat me immediatly, took me out of the game and apperently my team remaked (thank god) But this is the first time it has ever happened to me

replies.body: Bugsplatting in the middle of a game might suggest a driver issue or even a bad game file that failed to render something.  Try out the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up.  You should test it out in a custom game just to be extra safe!  Let me know if you have any questions!
